chunk:
Alteya Organics Tattoo Aftercare Liquid Serum

Brand: Alteya Organics

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil*, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil*, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil*, Cannabis Sativa (Hemp) Seed Oil*, Rosa Canina (Rosehip) Seed Oil*, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil*, Calendula Officinalis (Calendula) Flower Oil*, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract*, Triticum

(Hemp) Seed Oil*, Rosa Canina (Rosehip) Seed Oil*, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil*, Calendula Officinalis (Calendula) Flower Oil*, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract*, Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Germ Oil*, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Rosa Damascena (Rose) Flower Oil*, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil*, Eugenol**, Geraniol**,

Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract*, Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Germ Oil*, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Rosa Damascena (Rose) Flower Oil*, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil*, Eugenol**, Geraniol**, Citronellol**, Linalool**, Limonene**
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
